An R/Shiny app that visualizes survival rates based on PRRT treatment for Neuroendocrine Tumors.

This app was created by my research group at University of Iowas Summer Institue of Biostatistics with the help of Dr.Patrick Breheny

[Check out the app here.](https://ph-ivshiny.iowa.uiowa.edu/pbreheny/isib/)
